title: Trigger
desc: Choose what happens when BusKill's cable is disconnected
options_long: BusKill will immediately initiate a soft shutdown sequence, May cause data loss!
confirmation:
This selection may cause data loss! Are you sure you want to continue?

The 'soft-shutdown' trigger will immediately cause your computer to shutdown. This could cause you to lose work if, for example, you're writing an email or typing a text document.

Are you sure you want to select the 'soft-shutdown' trigger, despite the risk of data loss?

title: Font Face
desc: Choose the font in the app
